name: Counter Measures
description:
Face off in an arena filled with tanks and turrets as you try to cause as much chaos as possible without shooting a single bullet.  

Counter measures is a game where your only option is to deflect the bullets coming to you,  both for defensive and offensive purposes.

This game was made for the GMTK jam 2018 from the ground up over the span of 48 hours. No premade assets were used.

Controls:

  • WASD - move
  • Left mouse - counter
